body:
Comment 1: 
$ uname -a
Linux peter 2.6.32-34-generic #77-Ubuntu SMP Tue Sep 13 19:39:17 UTC 2011 x86_64
GNU/Linux
$ cat /etc/lsb-release 
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=10.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=lucid
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 10.04.3 LTS"

$ cd $GOROOT/src
$ pwd
/home/peter/go/src
$ hg id
fd30c132d1bd (release-branch.r60) release/release.r60.1
$ ./all.bash
<< SNIP >>
--- cd ../test
0 known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs
ALL TESTS PASSED
---

The compiler is 6g.
$
